original_text: You say you have counsel and might for war—but you speak only empty words. On whom are you depending, that you rebel against me?
korean_text: 내가 말하노니 네가 족히 싸울 계략과 용맹이 있노라 함은 입술에 붙은 말뿐이니라 네가 이제 누구를 믿고 나를 반역하느냐

sentences.original_text: You say you have counsel and might for war
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 전쟁을 위한 계략과 힘이 있다고 말합니다

sentences.original_text: but you speak only empty words
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 빈 말만 할 뿐입니다
